value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Kvasir is headed in the direction of
Vanaheimr's royal castle. We have
to follow, before we lose her!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_04,0|$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Stop right there, all of you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ah! L-Lady Nerþuz! I didn't think
we would meet again so soon!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Cool2|...Who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You...don't remember me?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We've traveled into the past...
To Nerþuz, this is the first time
we've met...$k$pWhich means this must be what she
was referring to when we spoke to
her before.$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|I am sorry, children of Midgard, but
Vanaheimr is not a place mortals can
come and go freely.$k$pNjörðr is sure to find you, and he
will make you suffer... You would do
well to turn back. Now.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We are on a mission of great
importance, though!$k$pPlease...allow us a little more time
here so we can see it through.$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|I am sorry, but there are rules.
Mortals may not freely travel
about in Vanaheimr.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Then we're left with no choice!
If we can't convince you, we'll just
have to fight our way past you!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Anger|Oh no... You don't seem to
understand me. A little punishment
ought to help you listen—and obey.$k$p

$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Well then, children of Midgard...
Make your move.$k$p$Sbs1000|
$SbpBGM_MNS_FE04_05,0|$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|You all are so adorable... Truly.$k$p

$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Forgive me... This IS unfair of me...
You have no hope of defeating me
with that meager strength of yours.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sh-she's right... What should we do,
Alfonse? What CAN we do?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$EFace|Sharena, what was it that Nerþuz
told you when we met her before?$k$p"Make your request as sweetly
as one of my beloved creatures
of the land might"?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|That's right! But I still don't really
understand what she meant...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Anger|Naughty children who don't do what
they're told might as well be asking
for punishment...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Lady Nerþuz! I, um...$k$p$EFace_Blush2|Purr-lease, Meow-ther of the Land!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Cool2|...Meow-ther?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Smile|Cuuute! I can hardly believe it...$k$pAnd what is your name, little one?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Sh-Sharena!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, Sharena, you ARE adorable...$k$p$EFace_Cool|...You're all free to go now!$k$pDo be careful to avoid Njörðr,
though, won't you?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|We can do that!$k$pOh, and...I hope you'll remember me
and be nice to us if we ever meet
in the future!$k$pWhen you meet me, please let
me know how you like to be
addressed!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|You mortals are strange...$k$pYou have my word, Sharena. I will
remember, should we ever meet
in the future...$k$p$Sbs150|
